item.title: [sis] Bonds of Faith
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Enchant creature

Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 as long as it's a Human. Otherwise, it can't attack or block.

item.title: [sis] Bloodflow Connoisseur
item.description:
Creature — Vampire

Sacrifice a creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Bloodflow Connoisseur.

item.title: [sis] Blazing Torch
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Equipped creature can't be blocked by Vampires or Zombies.

Equipped creature has "{T}, Sacrifice Blazing Torch: Blazing Torch deals 2 damage to any target."

Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

item.title: [sis] Battleground Geist
item.description:
Creature — Spirit

Flying

Other Spirit creatures you control get +1/+0.

item.title: [sis] Barter in Blood
item.description:
Sorcery

Each player sacrifices two creatures.

item.title: [sis] Balefire Dragon
item.description:
Creature — Dragon

Flying

Whenever Balefire Dragon deals combat damage to a player, it deals that much damage to each creature that player controls.

item.title: [sis] Avacyn's Pilgrim
item.description:
Creature — Human Monk

{T}: Add {W}.

item.title: [sis] Avacyn's Collar
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Equipped creature gets +1/+0 and has vigilance.

Whenever equipped creature dies, if it was a Human, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

Equip {2}

item.title: [sis] Avacyn, Angel of Hope
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Angel

Flying, vigilance, indestructible

Other permanents you control have indestructible.

item.title: [sis] Angel of Flight Alabaster
item.description:
Creature — Angel

Flying

At the beginning of your upkeep, return target Spirit card from your graveyard to your hand.

item.title: [ltr] Frodo, Sauron's Bane
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Halfling Citizen

{W/B}{W/B}: If Frodo, Sauron's Bane is a Citizen, it becomes a Halfling Scout with base power and toughness 2/3 and lifelink.

{B}{B}{B}: If Frodo is a Scout, it becomes a Halfling Rogue with "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, that player loses the game if the Ring has tempted you four or more times this game. Otherwise, the Ring tempts you."

https://magic.wizards.com/en/news/announcements/a-first-look-at-the-lord-of-the-rings-tales-of-middle-earth

item.title: [ltr] Samwise the Stouthearted
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Halfling Peasant

Flash

When Samwise the Stouthearted enters the battlefield, choose up to one target permanent card in your graveyard that was put there from the battlefield this turn. Return it to your hand. Then the Ring tempts you.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/news/announcements/a-first-look-at-the-lord-of-the-rings-tales-of-middle-earth

item.title: [ltr] Gollum, Patient Plotter
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Halfling Horror

When Gollum, Patient Plotter leaves the battlefield, the Ring tempts you.

{B}, Sacrifice a creature: Return Gollumn from your graveyard to your hand. Activate only as a sorcery.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/news/announcements/a-first-look-at-the-lord-of-the-rings-tales-of-middle-earth

item.title: [ltr] Mount Doom
item.description:
Legendary Land

{T}, Pay 1 life: Add {B} or {R}.

{1}{B}{R}, {T}: Mount Doom deals 1 damage to each opponent.

{5}{B}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice Mount Doom and a legendary artifact: Choose up to two creatures, then destroy the rest. Activate only as a sorcery.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/news/announcements/a-first-look-at-the-lord-of-the-rings-tales-of-middle-earth

item.title: [ltr] You Cannot Pass!
item.description:
Instant

Destroy target creature that blocked or was blocked by a legendary creature this turn.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/news/announcements/a-first-look-at-the-lord-of-the-rings-tales-of-middle-earth

item.title: [ltr] Reprieve
item.description:
Instant

Return target spell to its owner's hand.

Draw a card.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/news/announcements/a-first-look-at-the-lord-of-the-rings-tales-of-middle-earth

item.title: [ltr] Tom Bombadil
item.description:
Legendary Creature — God Bard

As long as there are four or more lore counters among Sagas you control, Tom Bombadil has hexproof and indestructible.

Whenever the final chapter ability of a Saga you control resolves, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a Saga card. Put that onto the battlefield and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. This ability triggers only once each turn.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/news/announcements/a-first-look-at-the-lord-of-the-rings-tales-of-middle-earth

item.description:
Artifact

item.title: [ltc] The Great Henge
item.description:
Legendary Artifact

This spell costs {X} less to cast, where X is the greatest power among creatures you control.

{T}: Add {G}{G}. You gain 2 life.

Whenever a nontoken creature enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on it and draw a card.

item.title: [ltc] Ensnaring Bridge
item.description:
Artifact

Creatures with power greater than the number of cards in your hand can't attack.

https://twitter.com/kanister_mtg/status/1286249167833178113

item.title: [ltc] Wasteland
item.description:
Land

{T}: Add {C}.

{T}, Sacrifice Wasteland: Destroy target nonbasic land.

item.title: [ltr] Trailblazer's Boots
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Equipped creature has nonbasic landwalk. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a nonbasic land.)

Equip {2}

item.title: [ltr] Aragorn and Arwen, Wed
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Elf Noble

Vigilance

Whenever Aragorn and Arwen, Wed enters the battlefield or attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control. You gain 1 life for each other creature you control.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/news/announcements/a-first-look-at-the-lord-of-the-rings-tales-of-middle-earth

item.title: [ltr] Sauron, the Lidless Eye
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Avatar Horror

When Sauron, the Lidless Eye enters the battlefield, gain control of target creature an opponent controls until end of turn. Untap it. It gains haste until end of turn.

{1}{B}{R}: Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn. Each opponent loses 2 life.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/news/announcements/a-first-look-at-the-lord-of-the-rings-tales-of-middle-earth

{W/B}{W/B}: If Frodo, Sauron's Bane is a Citizen, it becomes a Halfling Scout with base power and toughness 2/3 and lifelink.

{B}{B}{B}: If Frodo is a Scout, it becomes a Halfling Rogue with "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, that player loses the game if the Ring has tempted you four or more times this game. Otherwise, the Ring tempts you."

item.title: [ltr] The One Ring
item.description:
Legendary Artifact

Indestructible

When The One Ring enters the battlefield, if you cast it, you gain protection from everything until your next turn.

At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life for each burden counter on The One Ring.

{T}: Put a burden counter on The One Ring, then draw a card for each burden counter on The One Ring.

https://www.ign.com/articles/lord-of-the-rings-magic-the-gathering-cards-gandalf-one-ring-spoilers

item.description:

{B}, Sacrifice a creature: Return Gollumn from your graveyard to your hand. Activate only as a sorcery.

item.title: [ltc] Sam, Loyal Attendant
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Halfling Peasant

Partner with Frodo, Adventurous Hobbit (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Frodo into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)

At the beigining of combat on your turn, create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")

Acitvated abilities of Foods you control cost {1} less to activate.

item.title: [ltc] Radagast, Wizard of Wilds
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Avatar Wizard

Ward {1}

Beasts and Birds you control have ward {1}

Whenever you cast a spell with mana value 5 or greater, choose one —

• Create a 3/3 green Beast creature token.

• Create a 2/2 blue Bird creature token with flying.
